resources.string: "1. For which of the following disciplines is Nobel Prize awarded?"
"2. For which fruit is the US state of Georgia famous?"
"3. What is infant whale commonly called? "
"4. Approximately when did the Big Bang take place?"
"5. Euclid is associated with which branch of mathematics?"
"6. Graphite is composed of which element?"
"7. Historically, what is the name of Japan's warrior class?"
"8. How long does the light of the Sun take to reach the Earth?"
"9. How many atoms of hidrogen are there in two molecule of water?"
"10. What is the most abundant element in the air we breathe?"
